title: Converting potato peel waste into bioactive extracts: reduction of pesticides by traditional and novel pretreatment technologies
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, 2,386-399
DOI: 10.1039/D3FB00173C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Thanh-Tri Nguyen, Carmen Rosselló, Sergey Mikhaylin, Cristina Ratti
Pretreatment intensification demonstrated excellent potential for reducing hydrophilic pesticides in potato peel while preserving significant bioactive compound extracts.
